title: Impact of Skin Tone on Skin Tolerance to Shear in the Context of Pressure Injuries: Theory and Computer Modeling
details: T Katz, A Gefen - Advances in Skin & Wound Care, 2025
abstract: OBJECTIVE To investigate the impact of darker skin tones on skin tolerance to shear forces in the context of pressure injuries (PIs) and explore the mechanobiological hypothesis that people with darker skin may be at an increased PI risk due to altered …
